availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alfred A. Longley (Caldwell co, kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, dry goods clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Allen Longley. Resident in Callaway County, Missouri, in 1850. Dry goods clerk in Princeton, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Missouri, Callaway County, District 12, p. 256B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 113.
"Alfred A. Longley (1835-1886)," Find A Grave, Memorial #163691819, accessed June 30, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/163691819.
